ShortDescription: BCD Travel helps companies travel smart and achieve more. We drive program adoption, cost savings and talent retention through digital experiences that simplify business travel.
enhanced_description: BCD Travel, founded in 2006, is a global business travel management company serving clients in over 170 countries with a team of 13,000 dedicated members. The company provides digital experiences designed to simplify business travel, aiming to drive program adoption, achieve cost savings, and contribute to talent retention. BCD Travel's services also support modern work models such as flexible and remote work, aligning with organizational objectives to improve employee happiness and engagement.
